TopicTitle: Help, there is a gas giant between me and minmus

Articles.Content: One of my friends got me hooked on the KSP demo a couple weeks ago. After "landing" on the Mun, I bought the full version. In my first real mission I decided to attempt to go to minmus with an insanely overbuilt rocket. In attempting to get a minmus encounter I ended up getting a Kerbin escape, so I decided to take the rocket interplanetary. The easiest encounter to set up was with Jool, and after an eternity I finally got to Jool. Unfortunately I aerobraked too deep in the atmosphere, and ended up "landing" on the surface:D. Unfortunately all hands were lost .

Let me guess, gravity slingshot out of the kerbin system.

And welcome to the dark side. We have MOAR BOOSTERS!TM

Now go blow stuff up.
No just exploding a few hundred meters below the surface. I misjudged how deep to aerobrake (100km was too deep).

No just exploding a few hundred meters below the surface. I misjudged how deep to aerobrake (100km was too deep).

F5/F9 is your friend.
yes, welcome to the darkside! moar boosters, moar struts, MOAR JEB!

[i built]...an insanely overbuilt rocket... I ended up getting a Kerbin escape, so I decided to take the rocket interplanetary...and ended up "landing" on the surface. Unfortunately all hands were lost .

...I hear that.
